title.narrative: CUTS: Better Exploration of Trade as a Means of Poverty Reduction project (BETAMBOR) II

description.narrative: The overall goal of this project is to build capacity of state and non-state actors especially at the grassroots in order to strengthen and influence participation in the EIF process and to promote the role of trade in development. The project will thus b e implemented to meet the following objectives: Collating civil society's views in linking trade with developmental outcomes. Creating an opportunity for key stakeholders to provide their inputs into the DTIS development process. Linking communities and ul timate beneficiaries with the EIF process The anticipated outcomes from these activities are: Greater stakeholder buy-in in discourses on trade and development issues in Zambia. Enhanced opportunities for positive trade-related livelihood impacts at the gr ass-rootsThe following are some of the outputs that will be produced from this project: Generation of inputs (contained in research reports briefs etc.) for policy and practice level reforms based on evidence from the ground. Wide dissemination of informat ion and experiences (including challenges and opportunities) in the process of linking trade with livelihoods and other developmental objectives across Zambia. Participation and orientation of key stakeholder through meetings workshops discussions etc.
